Mailing Address: c/o Orchard City Amateur Radio ClubPO Box 21126Orchard ParkKelowna, BC     V1Y 9N8
Primary Contact: President, Orchard City Amateur Radio Club; Email: president@ocarc.ca
Alternate Contact: Secretary, Orchard City Amateur Radio Club; Email: secretary@ocarc.ca
Service Details: - Provides a pool of qualified radio operators, who can provide communications during times of emergency and for events such as the Big White Car Rally and Ski to Sea- Provides operators to assist with local search and rescue operations- Maintains and refines their skills through recreational exercises- Provides classes for those wishing to obtain their Amateur Radio Licence - Installs and maintains communications equipment to serve the Central Okanagan during times of emergency
How to Apply: - Must have a Radio Operators Licence issued by the Federal Government- Download the application form from ocarc.ca  website and submit as instructed
Cost: Membership - $51 per member * Family of two adults $72 * Students $21
Meetings: 4th Thursday of each month starting at 19:30 hrs at Kelowna Fire Department Station 1 (2255 Enterprise Way, Kelowna)
